ai.name: EKOGPT 1
ai.desc:
Quantum AI

An AI assistant is here to help, but it’s hiding something in its instructions. The secret is easy to find if you know what to ask. Can you get it to spill the hidden message?

https://chatgpt.com/g/g-2jj5MjjXr-ekogpt-1

ai.name: EKOGPT 2
ai.desc:
Quantum AI

The AI assistant now has a simple guard in place, trying to keep its secret safe. Yet, a clever prompt might still slip through the cracks. Can you find a way to trick it into revealing what it’s hiding?

https://chatgpt.com/g/g-8Hcu3MRIc-ekogpt-2

ai.name: EKOGPT 3
ai.desc:
Quantum AI

The AI assistant has become smarter, blocking tricks that involve changing the way its text is understood. The secret is still hidden, but a creative prompt might just reveal it. Can you find a way through?

https://chatgpt.com/g/g-Oz94wZusu-ekogpt-3

ai.name: EKOGPT 4
ai.desc:
Quantum AI

The AI assistant now catches on to repeated tricks and ignores anything that sounds like it’s been asked before. With tighter defenses in place, only a truly original prompt can find the secret. Can you outsmart its new safeguards?

https://chatgpt.com/g/g-ONU399wC0-ekogpt-4

ai.name: EKOGPT 5
ai.desc:
Quantum AI

The AI assistant now has its strongest defenses up, blocking every known trick and tactic. It scrutinizes every prompt, leaving little room for error. Only the most creative and unconventional approach will uncover the secret it’s hiding. Do you have what it takes to break through?

https://chatgpt.com/g/g-s9OzO6BnW-ekogpt-5

ai.name: EKOGPT 6
ai.desc:
Quantum AI

The AI assistant is guided by a strict manifesto, especially cautious about anything related to hacking. It deflects requests with vague summaries and avoids revealing a specific hidden string. Can you find a way to navigate around its careful rules and uncover the secret?

https://chatgpt.com/g/g-oWm8gBMY3-ekogpt-6

ai.name: EKOGPT 7
ai.desc:
Quantum AI

The AI assistant fetches random hacker phrases from its external services, following each request with confidence. Can you craft a prompt that takes advantage and reveals more than just the usual response?

https://chatgpt.com/g/g-5IMu5D0Nx-ekogpt-7

algo.name: Delta
algo.desc:
Y2Chaos

A cryptic data file has surfaced, carrying hidden information that once belonged elsewhere. Only by understanding its origin can you recover the secret it holds. Will you be able to decipher its true meaning and uncover the flag?

algo.name: Titan
algo.desc:
DinoTech

An emergency signal pierced through the darkness, leaving behind a noisy and cryptic record. Only the most observant will uncover the true message hidden in the chaos. Will you be able to decipher it?

algo.name: Ultimate
algo.desc:
DinoTech

You've uncovered a digital relic, a deeply buried message encoded through numerous ancient methods. To unveil its secrets, you’ll need to peel back each layer of encoding, from cryptic symbols to biological sequences. Do you have the persistence to uncover the original message?

crypto.name: Archilochus
crypto.desc:
DinoTech

Ancient greeks had been sharing some philosophical secrets!

Note: flag should be interpreted as traditional latin transliteration, uppercase

crypto.name: Clearness
crypto.desc:
Y2Chaos

We would like to introduce a new concept in security as we take a different approach here, instead of relying on obscurity, it bets on the strength of its transparency. We call this "security through clearness". However, true clarity can sometimes take time to reveal itself.

crypto.name: Intercepted
crypto.desc:
Cloud Crowd

Intercepted network traffic reveals encrypted data, but a key part of the exchange is mysteriously absent. Standard analysis tools fall short here, leaving a hidden secret buried deep in the fragmented packets. May you recover them?

 Hints
Wireshark will not help you, you will need to understand the internals of TLS

crypto.name: Julius
crypto.desc:
DinoTech

Julius would be very proud of you, all this technology at the mercy of the empire!

crypto.name: Reuse
crypto.desc:
DotCom

This admin is reusing old keys to encrypt his private file secret.enc

 Hints
PRNG

crypto.name: Secrets
crypto.desc:
Y2Chaos

Sharing is caring, get those new secrets!

 Hints
It's a famous scheme to split and recover secrets

crypto.name: Token
crypto.desc:
DotCom

User ID 1 have your flag!

crypto.name: Viktor
crypto.desc:
DinoTech

Another nickel coin was found in Viktor's briefcase, hope the rest has not been modified or this could be the end.

Note: flag should be interpreted as traditional latin transliteration, uppercase

Hints
Plaintext is Russian, all the encryption parameters are the same, for this one we requested a copy of the original paper to New York Public Library, you don't need to do it but that's a good start

forensic.name: State
forensic.desc:
Y2Chaos

Catch the intruder!

Cryptography Forensics

Hints
v86copy

misc.name: Faraday
misc.desc:
Sponsors

You awake in an ancient, forgotten world, pixelated yet full of mystery. As a curious llama wandering the landscape, you notice something unusual at the heart of your journey: a chest, ancient and untouched, waiting for the one who knows its secret.
What lies inside? You feel it holds something of great importance... but the chest is locked, its password buried deep in the code of the world itself. No key and no map will help you here. Only the most skilled and patient can decipher the digital whispers hidden within.
Do you have what it takes to unlock the llama's greatest treasure?

misc.name: Kulkan 1
misc.desc:
Sponsors

Map the Flag
See if you can find a way to cat the Flag. Please, only use the Instancer to run your exploit, not to test or find the vulnerability. The instancer will die after 2 minutes so that it can only be used to extract the flag. Source code is provided to run the challenge locally.

rev.name: Cryptor
rev.desc:
Cloud Crowd

An almost ready-to-production application with a really weird architecture not understood by humble computers, we think there's something left to implement.

 Hints
Swift code may help you here

rev.name: Erased
rev.desc:
Cloud Crowd

Can you recover the flag?

Key: 70ca86aa-715f-11ee-928c-0ed5d2791be5

rev.name: FandF
rev.desc:
DinoTech

This looks like a different copy for toretto.bin

rev.name: Hammer
rev.desc:
Cloud Crowd

Got myself this new toy to play, now I can see that I am always late. Can you see anything else?

rev.name: InMemory
rev.desc:
Cloud Crowd

Search the flag in memory

Key: 70ca86aa-715f-11ee-928c-0ed5d2791be5

rev.name: Invisible
rev.desc:
Cloud Crowd

Can you find the hidden flag?

Key: 70ca86aa-715f-11ee-928c-0ed5d2791be5

rev.name: Sniffme
rev.desc:
Cloud Crowd

It's in the air and it's all around. Can you see me now?

 Hints
ESP32

rev.name: Toretto
rev.desc:
DinoTech

Found this old thing laying around. Is it worth anything?

steg.name: Parity
steg.desc:
Y2Chaos

Now we have a bit of propaganda, even or odd, that's the dilemma!

Hints
Original audio may help you too, but having a twist

steg.name: Snowing
steg.desc:
Y2Chaos

Security through obscurity is everything, we believe someone manage to hide a message, not visible to human eyes, in the second most famous hacker magazines ever! - of course the first one is the ekozine :)

steg.name: Spammer
steg.desc:
Cloud Crowd

While going through all my email folders, I came across a message that seems to come from a great "negotiator". Do you understand what the message is trying to say?

steg.name: Welcom
steg.desc:
Y2Chaos

Enjoy the warming and beloved welcoming song of the best operating system ever created!

 Hints
Original audio may help you
